fields.name: Regarding 4169:
fields.value:
Attributes of roles not present in the game do not exist.
Attack: None | Defense: None

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - You can track who your target visits at night and see everyone that visits your target.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- With the Necronomicon you can choose to Basic attack someone.
- Your heightened senses allow you to overhear all whispers.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who oppose the Coven.
